base_tours_used.title: Spiritual Serenity in Da Nang: Temples, Hills & Silence
base_tours_used.description:
# 🌊 Da Nang – *“Beachfront City: Temples, Springs & Modern Soul”*

**Duration:** 2 Days  
**Trip Type:** Relaxation + urban exploring  
**Ideal For:** First-timers, beach lovers, families  
**Best Season:** March–August

---

## 🧭 Overview

**Da Nang** is where **Vietnam’s urban spirit meets coastal calm**. Think **beach mornings, mountaintop pagodas**, and seafood markets with ocean-to-table freshness. In just two days, you’ll taste the past, soak in hot springs, and toast to the city skyline — a perfect sampler of Vietnam’s modern charm.

---

## 📅 Itinerary Breakdown

### 🗓 **Day 1: Coast, Culture & Viewpoints**

- **09:00** – Airport pickup and transfer to your **beachfront hotel**.  
- **10:00** – Discover the **Marble Mountains**:
  - Explore mystical caves, centuries-old **Buddhist shrines**, and sweeping coastal views.  
- **13:00** – **Seafood lunch** at a market-style grill — you choose your catch!  
- **15:00** – Drive along the coast to **Son Tra Peninsula**, visit the **Lady Buddha Statue**:
  - A 67-meter-tall protector watching over the sea.  
- **17:00** – Optional soak at **Suoi Than Tai Hot Springs**:
  - Natural mineral baths, mud spa, and onsen-style relaxation.  
- **19:00** – **Dinner by My Khe Beach** — watch the waves roll in.  
  - Optional: **Cocktail at Sky36**, Da Nang’s highest rooftop bar.

---

### 🗓 **Day 2: Hoi An Add-On or Chill**

Choose your vibe:

#### 🛕 Option A: **Hoi An Day Tour**
- Wander the lantern-lit streets of **Ancient Town**  
- Visit **Japanese Bridge**, **tailor shops**, and **street food gems**  
- Enjoy a riverside lunch and drop by local artisans’ homes

#### 🏖 Option B: **Beach & Water Fun**
- Wake up to **My Khe Beach**  
- Try **banana boat rides**, **parasailing**, or a gentle paddleboard session  
- Or: spa morning, coconut coffee by the sea, and souvenir shopping

- **12:00** – Return to hotel, check-out, and transfer to airport or next destination.

---

## 🚐 What’s Included

- ✅ 1-night beachfront hotel stay  
- ✅ All meals listed  
- ✅ Entry tickets to Marble Mountains, Lady Buddha, hot springs (if chosen)  
- ✅ Private transport & English-speaking guide

---

## 🧳 What to Bring

- 🧴 **Sunscreen** & sunglasses  
- 👕 **Light clothing** (linen or cotton recommended)  
- 👙 **Beachwear** + sandals  
- 📷 **Camera** or phone with wide lens for epic panoramas

---

> *Da Nang is a gentle collision — where sea meets skyline, and tradition flows into trend.*
